revisions.rev:
'''Wei Zhuang''' is one of the main antagonists of the Chinese Series, Qin's Moon. He is always shown with a female assistant at his side. He has an ongoing rivalry with [[Ge Nie]], and has even progressed to the point that he wants to kill him.
==Background== According to the animated series [[Qin's Moon]], he was originally from the school Gui Gu. He studied alongside [[Ge Nie]], his rival, and mastered the art of the sword. It is unknown what led to the circumstances, but it is mentioned in the first episode of season 1, that he massacred the Mohist warriors, thus becoming wanted by them. He was forced to hide in the jungle, until he was hired by Emperor Qin to hunt down Ge Nie.
==Personality== He is a cold, emotionless being, demanding respect from others. He looks down on people asking for help, unless he has something to gain from it. He is often shown with a female assistant at his side. In addition, his underlings are many.
==Abilities== His skill with the sword is impressive, and is able to fight with [[Ge Nie]] on equal footing. He is efficient at throwing long-range weapons and is brilliant at thinking out strategies.
==Plot== After massacring the Mohist warriors, and becoming a wanted man, he hid in the jungle until the Emperor's Adviser asked for his help. He was initially contemptuous at the request for help, until he finally agreed because of his desire to duel Ge Nie. He then sent assassins to track and retrieve his targets, but all of his attempts failed.
==External links== * [http://translate.googleusercontent.com/translate_c?hl=en&sl=zh-CN&u=http://space.tv.cctv.com/article/ARTI1206097698960625&prev=/search%3Fq%3Dcctv%2B8%2B%25E7%25A7%25A6%25E6%2597%25B6%25E6%2598%258E%25E6%259C%2588%26hl%3Den%26client%3Dfirefox-a%26rls%3Dorg.mozilla:en-US:official%26hs%3DSpw%26sa%3DG&rurl=translate.google.ca&usg=ALkJrhiZ-tNErz_nRDsrtSb8yLHXK_RNMA/Google Translation of First Season Synopsis]
